title: What were Season 1&2 world championship Winners Elo at the time?
body: Title. Idk how to check this anywhere.

replies.body:
Yes Lolking. For Dyrus.

2934 is LolKing Score (which is an approximation based on LolKing)
I fail to see how this helps

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jj77Xsma,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-04-06T18:23:42.511+0000)

I posted that to show the wayback machine pls , but worlds season 1 happened in 2011 which isn't on there, I literally said nothing about the lolking score.

Well you didn't say anything else either. So we are left with assumptions and we know what those do.

I assumed you meant something.
You assumed everyone would think something else.
And the way back machine said, "FK U Both"

The elo was the same if fact it was higher in season two

over 2.2K I have to check the amount.

But their are 2 reasons why they are worst players

1. Less people played the game at that time.

2. Teams played much more of a solo queue style back then, they didn't optimism like they do today they plays what they through was the best.

hidden? http://gyazo.com/d190639a857b048154cfe076102e1fca hello?>
I've heard people say season 1 and 2 worlds don't count in terms of skill.

Fnatic and TPA. Yep, no skill.

If we measure them in terms of today, but we can't. Because of different metas, regions of play, and overall skill level across the board. We can say that TPA was the best team of Season 2. And Fnatic was the best team of Season 1, but just like Season 3 SKT T1 wins world then doesn't event make it to Season 4 worlds. Everything changes and that is good, because if the game didn't evolve, the skill level didn't improve. This game would be boring.

The past is the past. Players get better. New players debut skill. And we get GE/EDG/UoL/H2K/TIP/etc

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=jj77Xsma,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-06T16:16:49.101+0000)

And Fnatic was the best team of Season 1, but just like Season 3 SKT T1 wins world then doesn't event make it to Season 4 worlds. i'm not here to debat skill i'm just looking for their actual elo number
